overview:
Possessing over ten years of experience in the field of multi-channel retail e-commerce, business development and monetization, integrated marketing and product development, Vladimir is an executive consultant with proven expertise in Search Engine Marketing, Direct Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Viral Marketing, Cause Marketing, Multi-Medium Business Integration, Web Development and User Experience.

In his previous experiences Vladimir developed and managed ideas, concepts and projects for start-up businesses as well as world largest fortune 500 corporations. Vladimir possess knowledge in multitude of subjects related to building unique businesses, operation and monetization.

Vladimir has held senior positions and provided consulting services for companies such as: Cirque du Soleil, Aldo Shoes, Ice.com, OneBigPlanet, Lord & Taylor, LaSenza, GM Canada, Bombardier, and many more.
